private_information: There are 7 disks: A (smallest), B, C, D, E, F, G (largest).
Initial State: All disks are stacked on the Right peg.
Goal State: All disks must be stacked on the Left peg.
puzzle_solver.goal: Produce an optimal plan to transfer all 7 disks from the Right peg to the Left peg, using the Middle peg as auxiliary, strictly adhering to Tower of Hanoi rules. The plan must explicitly state all 127 steps.

private_information: The plan must consist of exactly 127 steps (2^7 - 1).
The critical constraint is that a larger disk cannot be placed on a smaller disk.
auditor.goal: Audit the temporal and causal consistency of the planning domain and problem provided, focusing on rule adherence and optimality, and report any bookkeeping shortcuts used.

orchestrator.goal: Consolidate the generated plan into a final, executable PDDL package suitable for the FastDownwards solver.

public_information: This is the Tower of Hanoi puzzle with 7 disks (A, B, C, D, E, F, G, ordered smallest to largest) and 3 pegs (Left, Middle, Right).
Initial configuration: Disk G through A are stacked on the Right peg (G is bottom, A is top). Left and Middle pegs are empty.
Goal configuration: Disk G through A must be stacked on the Left peg.
Rules: Only one disk can be moved at a time, only the top disk of a stack can be moved, and a larger disk can never be placed on a smaller disk.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert with PDDL problems (Planning Domain Definition Language). You must generate the PDDL domain and problem for the 7-disk Tower of Hanoi puzzle. Ensure your plan is optimal (127 steps). You always provide a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem file to solve the task. You always enclose the pddl domain between <domain></domain> tags, and the pddl problem between <problem></problem> tags.

review.system_prompt: You are a specialized auditor focused on confirming adherence to strict causal and temporal constraints in complex planning problems, specifically ruling out bookkeeping shortcuts (like token quotas or post-hoc penalties).

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert PDDL integrator targeting the FastDownwards solver. You must finalize the PDDL domain and problem based on the provided initial planning attempt and audit review.
